name: Top-Secret Neon-Pink Planet
description:
This is a scrap game that wasn't / will probably never be, finished. I'm releasing it so you can play it, since I have no intention to go further with it right now. There's lots of things in this game- See included documentation for details.

This game is one I've used to showcase my art/ skills/ personal style for a while- But it's never been playable, and since I've stopped working on it, it seems fair to release it.

The world is not very finished, it should be busier. Bear in mind when you play this that you are playing something very incomplete. Most cutscenes don't lead anywhere.

There is no goal in this game, it is just a world to explore- I one day might start this game again, free of some of the problems that plagued it.
